oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WWI German bayonet and scabbard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A model 98/05 bayonet made by Waffenfabrik Mauser A. G. Oberndorf am Necker as marked on the ricasso of the blade. The spine bears proof marks and "16" indicating the year of manufacture. The bayonet is accompanied by a painted steel scabbard that has been stamped "0572" near the throat. A black shoe lace is wrapped around the hilt and guard.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
